title: Rebase program with negative shift delta in IDA
content: If a binary file is open with ROM starting at 0x10A000, how do I easily change the ROM starting address of the file to 0x109000? I always had to restart IDA to do it. I also tried to "rebase the program using shift delta" but I don't know how to use a negative shift delta, plus it's not automated.

answers_data.content: Rebase it and choose a new Image base of 0x109000 instead of trying to specify a Shift delta.

comments.text: Hello, by any chance, can this be automated using IDC?

answers_data.content:
Look in IDA menu: 

Edit->Segments->Rebase program.
